articles.title: SEC Media Days Appearance The Start of a Series of Firsts For LSU Coach Brian Kelly - Sports Illustrated

articles.content: ATLANTA—It’s been a while since Brian Kelly did the whole summer media days thing, 2009 to be exact, which was his last season as coach at Cincinnati. Most of the talk surrounding Kelly this offseaso… [+3569 chars]

articles.title: What's Sharks' Cap Situation After Re-Signing Kunin, Kahkonen? - San Jose Hockey Now
articles.description: The San Jose Sharks are bringing back Luke Kunin and Kaapo Kahkonen with almost-identical contracts. Per Puckpedia, RFA winger Kunin has re-signed for two years with a $2.75 million dollar AAV. Per Elliotte Friedman, RFA goalie Kahkonen has re-signed for two …
